sources.title: Hacker | Full Movie | Mystery Thriller | Haylie Duff
sources.description:
Hacker - The teenage girl witnessed the arrest of her father. As an adult, she become a hacker and assisted in national security. While on task she discovered assassination of a congressman.
2017.  Stars: Haylie Duff, Craig Stark, Dan Spector

sources.title: Hacker | Full Movie | Crime Thriller | True Events!
sources.description:
Hacker - Alex, an immigrant from Ukraine comes to Canada and becomes involved with an online criminal organization called Darkweb. He learns to rip off credit cards, ATMs, break into banks and eventually the stock market. He engages a network of service staff to help collect information, and partners with a guy named Sye, and a girl named Kira, to help sell the online-bought merchandise. What starts off as a way to help his parents financially, soon becomes a personal vendetta against the entire banking system, when his mother is fired from her job at the bank.
2016.  Stars: Callan McAuliffe, Lorraine Nicholson, Daniel Eric Gold
**Llicensed from Distribution Solutions/Alliance Entertainment. All rights reserved**

metadata.Plot: When his family hits financial trouble, Alex Danyliuk turns to a life of crime and identity theft, with the help of Sye, a street-wise hustler who introduces him to the world of black market trading, Kira, a young female hacker, and contacts on the dark web. After finding success in causing financial market chaos, they gain the attention of Z, a mysterious masked figure, who's the head of an organization known as Anonymous, and a number one target by the FBI,
metadata.Actors: Callan McAuliffe, Lorraine Nicholson, Daniel Eric Gold
metadata.Country: United States, Thailand, Kazakhstan, Hong Kong, Canada
